msc.title: MSci in Natural Sciences (Systems Biology) 1 st Class
msc.subtitle: University of Cambridge 2009-2012
msc.text: My programming career started at the end of university, when I started coding as part of the Systems Biology Course. During this year I became insterested in applying mathematical modelling and statstics to biological systems. In my dissertation I used these techniques to understand the regulation of fat metabolism which in turn is important for understanding human health disorders such as obesity and diabetes.
